marklogic.body: Loving this food for our Ridgeback Mix! She was on Purina Pro when we got her from the shelter and switched to 4Health Large Breed nearly 3 weeks ago. The transition was tough on her stomach- gas and Diarrhea for a couple days but now we've seen a huge difference. Her coat is the biggest thing- shiny, rich in color, and not shedding like she was before. Her bowels also seem to be more consistent and her energy level is improved. Can't say enough good things!
